import React, {useState} from 'react' import {GrAdd} from 'react-icons/gr' import './style.css' function Faq() { const [oepnAns, setOpenAns] = useState(false) const handleOpenAns = (id) => { // Toggle the state for the FAQ item with the given ID setOpenAns((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [id]: !prevState[id], })); }; // Define your FAQ items with unique IDs const faqItems = [ { id: 1, question: 'What is Afrimart?', answer: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula...', }, { id: 2, question: 'How does Afrimart work?', answer: 'Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aenean commodo ligula...', }, // Add more FAQ items here with unique IDs ]; return (
